snippet: The United Nations refugee agency said on Friday that armed groups are attacking Syrian civilians as they try to flee to Jordan to escape the conflict in their country.
lead_paragraph: The United Nations refugee agency said on Friday that armed groups are attacking Syrian civilians as they try to flee to Jordan to escape the conflict in their country.

headline.seo: Syrian Refugees Attacked by ‘Armed Groups,’ U.N. Says
headline.main: Syrian Refugees Attacked by ‘Armed Groups,’ U.N. Says
headline.print_headline: Syrian Refugees Attacked by ‘Armed Groups,’ U.N. Says
